entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
